formula: E.g.f.: -(-1+2*x)/(1-3*x+x^2)Recurrence: {a(1)=1, a(0)=1, (n^2+3*n+2)*a(n)+(-6-3*n)*a(n+1)+a(n+2)=0}Sum(1/5*(-1+4*_alpha)*_alpha^(-1-n), _alpha=RootOf(_Z^2-3*_Z+1))*n!a(n)=n!*sum(binomial(n-1,k-1)*Fibonacci(k),k,1,n); n>0 [From _Vladimir Kruchinin_, Sep 01 2010]a(n) = n!*A001519(n). - _R. J. Mathar_, Nov 27 2011
